body: this is just stupid. its realistic while you keep it about mutual benefits, fucking up the ladder and all that. but as soon as you turn it to pure one-sided evil, and make the other person just hate you and see no benefit or reason to put up with you, it won't work. no matter in what position of power you think you are over them, drive enough people desperate and mad enough and you're gonna end up dead sooner or later. with some luck even just one guy will do.
Lol. Is there a guy who would watch their gf getting fucked? Regardless of the situation.
for a hardcore NTR guy, I must admit this is sad. Despite looking creepy as fuck, the producer guy is a ball-less faggot.
hmm it really gets to shit in the end......LOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOL......ok
